p.span: Hondo ISD will comply with Governor Abbott's order for school closure, with the continuation of remote instruction, for the rest of the school year.
More information will follow as it becomes available.

div.span: During the current school closure, HISD will be providing meals as follows:

br.span: Breakfast & Lunch Packages served from10:30 a.m. – 12:30 p.m. at Woolls Intermediate School

p.span: Alert: Peanut butter sandwiches will be served – see staff for details.

br.span: Please place cold foods into refrigerator if not immediately consumed. Frozen food may be provided for heating at home – keep frozen until preparing for consumption.
In order to protect our employees and reduce contact for families,
you will be asked to pop open your trunk and if that is not possible, meals will be placed on a table for parents to grab and place in their vehicle.

div.span: Please attempt to pick up meals as early as possible so that we can adequately plan the number of meals needed. Supplies may be limited. Closure can occur in cases of severe weather prohibiting curbside service.
See www.hondoisd.net/Childnutrition for details about eligibility and documentation

p.span: By staying apart for the time being, Hondo ISD is working to ensure that we are limiting the spread of COVID-19 in our community. In service of this, I want to share a one-minute video that reminds us of the most important actions we can take as individuals to reduce risk for ourselves and others:

li.span: Stay home as much as you can, especially if you have a cough, fever, or shortness of breath

p.span: I encourage you to watch this video with your family. And be sure to share it with family and friends on social media and via email. Click on link below:
ven though we are currently apart, we look forward to coming back together as a community soon.

div.p: With minimal staff on campuses and reduced hours due to COVID-19 closures, the district has implemented auto-attendant on the campus main phone numbers. If you need to get in contact with the campus leadership, you can reach them by using their extension when prompted to do so or leave a message with the campus secretary as directed and your message will be forwarded.
All staff members are monitoring email. Email addresses for campus staff can be found on each campus webpage.

p.span: Hondo ISD WIFI is available in the Hondo High School main campus parking lot for any students who need to connect.
We ask that you practice social distancing by staying in your vehicle, but you are still access the network and internet.
Be sure your devices are charged.
The Yancey Water Supply Corporation has made public WIFI available to your community. You can access this service in the parking lot at their district office located at 150 County Road 743 in Yancey.
Please practice social distancing by staying in your vehicle. The connection is available from outside the building. Be sure your devices are charged.
Thank you Yancey Water Supply for supporting our community and School District during this time.

br.p: Message from Superintendent Dr. A'Lann Truelock
Information about meal availability for pickup

div.a: Free WIFI in Yancey now available

br.p: Yancey Water Supply Corp offers Free WIFI
K'STAR Youth and family resources still available

div.h4: Send email to hootline@hondoisd.net and join the parent listserv.

div.h3: Our vision at Hondo ISD is to develop life-long learners who are productive members of society.
In our relentless pursuit of academic excellence, our mission at Hondo ISD is to make learning the priority for all and serve the educational needs of every student, in every classroom, every day.

div.p:
Hondo ISD is committed to providing a website that is accessible to the widest possible audience, regardless of technology or ability. This website endeavors to comply with best practices and standards as defined by Section 508 of the U.S. Rehabilitation Act. If you would like additional assistance
or have accessibility concerns, please contact Mary Jo Peters at 830-426-3311. We will continue to work to improve the accessibility standards of our website.
